about.banner.title: Information
about.intro.title: About Panshaker
about.intro.p1: Panshaker Services is leading the charge in North American restaurant automation. Our mission: bring authentic Eastern flavors across borders so every city can enjoy great food. By pairing industrial-grade automation hardware with our own AI, we deliver kitchens that are reliable, efficient, and built to scale.
about.intro.p2: We pioneered unmanned cooking for Chinese cuisine in North America — turning unpredictable kitchen workflows into standardized, repeatable processes. That means lower labor costs, higher efficiency, consistent quality, and simpler operations.
about.intro.p3: Beyond running our own brands, we empower existing restaurants through a store-within-a-store model and equipment subscriptions. Our edge? Self-built wok robots, AI-powered vision monitoring, and PanOS.
about.intro.p4: We're just getting started. From wok robots to full-stack Chinese cuisine infrastructure — we're lowering the barrier for restaurant entrepreneurs everywhere. Cutting-edge tech that bridges the physical and digital worlds, creating value for operators and better experiences for diners.
about.brand.desc: Panshaker Services is the overseas brand of xinchushi
about.team.title: Leadership
about.team.xu.name: Haoran Xu
profile.xu.name: Haoran Xu
profile.xu.p1: Haoran Xu holds a Ph.D. and M.S. in Engineering from the University of Washington, a B.S. in Mathematics from The Ohio State University, and a B.A. in Film from Northwestern University (Qatar).
profile.xu.p2: Before founding Panshaker, Haoran founded ADiB Consulting in 2023. He interned as a software engineer at Samsung China, ROHM Semiconductor China, and Hyundai AutoEver (2022–2025), interned at Hengdu Law Firm as a patent agent in 2025, and has been a CS research assistant at Ohio University since Oct 2025.
profile.sun.name: Qisheng Sun
profile.sun.p1: Qisheng Sun holds an M.S. from UC San Diego, dual B.S. degrees in Computer Science and Mathematics from Case Western Reserve University, and a Mathematics degree from Xi'an Jiaotong University.
profile.unknown.name: unknown
profile.unknown.p1: unknown holds a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of Pennsylvania and a B.S. in Computer Science from Tianjin University.
careers.title: Careers
careers.heading: Join the Team
careers.role.title: Lead Field Service Technician
careers.role.overview_desc: Lead on-site installation, commissioning, and maintenance for Panshaker automated cooking systems — making sure everything runs smoothly and our customers succeed.
careers.role.resp_1: Install, commission, and maintain Panshaker automated cooking equipment on-site.
careers.role.resp_2: Diagnose technical issues and perform repairs to minimize downtime.
careers.role.resp_3: Train and support kitchen staff on our systems.
careers.role.resp_4: Maintain detailed service logs and report on hardware performance.
investors.loading: We're still cooking. Thanks for your patience and support.
investors.subtitle: Wishing you all the best.
